name: Rivera Benson
description: I am greatful that I took this cooking course. The instructor was very patient. He allowed me to ask questions whenever I had a doubt about the instructions. When necessary, he gave examples using modern day utensils. I learned lots of information about food preparation, food safety and tools used in the kitchen. This is a very high quality program.

name: Jennifer Brock
description: I am delighted to write a review for this cooking course which I took. The course was presented in a professional, easy-to-follow format with clear and detailed explanations of many recipes. I also found the information about different cooking techniques to be helpful as well.

name: Roseann Miles
description: I would like to thank you for this course and the time you spent covering each topic in depth. You covered a lot of ground from simple sorting to advanced counting functions. I now have the tools and confidence to tackle more advanced Chef problems, thanks to your teaching style.
